footer.description: Provider of intelligent security solutions: Video surveillance, image analysis, access control, data networks/storage, hypervision...

popup.title: Sign up and get
popup.description: Join our community and enjoy exclusive offers and immediate discounts on our Online Store.
popup.contactDescription: Contact us and receive additional discounts

homepageHero.heroTitle: Intelligent Solutions for Security and Video Surveillance
homepageHero.heroDescription: Surveillance cameras, video analytics, access control, network storage systems, hypervision, and more.
homepageHero.section2Text1: Security no longer depends on brute force, but on intelligence. At Pixecurity, we are providers of intelligent security systems.
homepageHero.section2Text2: Our mission: to support you with the best products and tailor-made solutions, rethinking security according to your needs.

home.offerTitle: A Revolutionary Offering for Security and Safety
home.offerDescription1: Pixecurity ensures the protection of your personal data with advanced solutions: cutting-edge electronic equipment, an innovative project management platform for seamless interaction with our experts, custom developments tailored to your needs, and robust cybersecurity integrations.
home.offerDescription2: In terms of compliance, our certified consultants deliver certifications aligned with the most demanding standards. With comprehensive coverage of the value chain, Pixecurity positions itself as the leader in next-generation security and video surveillance solutions, combining innovation and expertise.
home.aboutUsDescription: Visionary engineers and 3.0 experts, born in the digital era, combining expertise in construction, network infrastructure, and cutting-edge building technologies. Always staying ahead of technological advancements, our teams are true security artisans, dedicated to crafting tailor-made solutions perfectly aligned with the specific needs of our clients.

videoprotection.title: Smart Video Surveillance
videoprotection.description: Leverage advanced image analysis to simplify processes and save time without unnecessary complexity. Pixecurity offers top-tier solutions tailored to your security needs.

analyseImage.title: Advanced Video Analytics
analyseImage.description: Protect assets and people with cutting-edge technologies: high-definition cameras, thermal imaging, mobile solutions, fish-eye lenses, and more. Pixecurity brings you the best market solutions for your security projects.

controleAcces.title: Access Control Systems
controleAcces.description: Ensure safety and traceability with comprehensive access management solutions. Pixecurity partners with industry leaders to provide innovative and reliable systems tailored to your installations.

cloudObjetsConnectes.title: Cloud and Connected Devices
cloudObjetsConnectes.description: Transform your connected devices into reliable safety sensors accessible from any user interface. Pixecurity designs smart, scalable solutions to fully utilize their potential.

reseauxStockage.title: Optimized Networks and Storage
reseauxStockage.description: Guarantee seamless data transport and processing with our expertise in network infrastructures. Pixecurity engineers ensure optimal sizing of your IT systems and storage resources.

ingenierie.title: Security Engineering
ingenierie.description: Benefit from comprehensive support from our engineering experts: pre-sales, project follow-up, maintenance, commissioning, and technical documentation. Pixecurity supports you at every stage of your projects.

homepagePartners.partnersTitle: Our Security and Video Surveillance Partners
homepagePartners.partnersDescription: Pixecurity selects the best surveillance cameras, video management systems, and IP solutions tailored to your security needs.

expertiseHeroTitle: Our Expertise: Your protection, our commitment
expertiseHeroDescription: With Pixecurity, your safety is in good hands at every step, from design to certification.

forces.point1: Cutting-edge electronic tools, custom-tailored to meet your needs.
forces.point2: An internally developed project management platform, offering easy interaction with our experts.
forces.point3: Custom development solutions, designed specifically for you.
forces.point4: Advanced cybersecurity measures for optimal protection.
forces.point5: Issuance of compliance certifications by our specialized consultants.

cam1.title: Visible Cameras
cam1.subtitle: The all-terrain camera
cam1.description: Day and night, visible cameras are used for detection, recognition, and identification. Pixecurity works with top manufacturers for this type of camera.

cam2.title: Thermal Cameras
cam2.subtitle: Increase contrasts
cam2.description: Thermal cameras enhance contrasts between the object we want to detect and identify and the surrounding environment. A specific and thorough pre-analysis helps in selecting the ideal thermal camera.

cam3.title: Specialized Cameras
cam3.subtitle: Each situation has its camera
cam3.description: Gas detection, embedded cameras, ATEX environments, mobile, fish-eye... Each environment has its specific camera.

realTime.title: Real-time Analysis Solutions
realTime.subtitle: Increase intelligence
realTime.description: Pixecurity partners with software for intrusion detection, abandoned package detection, counting, machine learning...

postAnalysis.title: Post-analysis Solutions
postAnalysis.subtitle: Save time
postAnalysis.description: Colorimetry, searching for individuals, objects, vehicles, license plates, during in-depth investigations by the client.

businessIntelligence.title: Analysis and Business Intelligence
businessIntelligence.subtitle: Go further
businessIntelligence.description: Implementing statistical tools on attendance rates, behavioral analysis, visitor management, clientele...

doorManagement.title: Door and Access Management
doorManagement.subtitle: VIP access control
doorManagement.description: From the environment of the access point to the badge type, Pixecurity works with qualified Level 3 partners on solutions: Til, Primion, Nedap.

secureArchitecture.title: Secure Architecture (ANSSI)
secureArchitecture.subtitle: Save time
secureArchitecture.description: A thoughtful design, Pixecurity implements physical, software, and logical architecture to comply with GDPR recommendations and those of ANSSI.

fullIntegratedSolution.title: Fully Integrated Solution (Hypervision)
fullIntegratedSolution.subtitle: A unique solution
fullIntegratedSolution.description: Pixecurity offers a fully integrated video/access control solution via partners working on an open philosophy (Milestone, Til).

fullCloudSolutions.title: Full-cloud Security Solutions
fullCloudSolutions.subtitle: A full-cloud video and access control architecture
fullCloudSolutions.description: The transition to full-cloud is underway, Pixecurity offers a packaged full-cloud video/access control solution to address storage, network, and IT hardware costs. The solution is available for a one-time purchase or on a subscription basis.

cloudProjectManagement.title: Pixecurity Project Management in Full-cloud
cloudProjectManagement.subtitle: Pixplatform
cloudProjectManagement.description: The world has changed: project management and work are done remotely. Pixecurity offers you a powerful cloud-based tool to track your projects, deliveries... your security philosophy.

connectedObjects.title: Connected Objects
connectedObjects.subtitle: Data and speed
connectedObjects.description: 5G has arrived, from drones, phones, BIM remote controls, data retrieval has never been easier and faster. Pixecurity leverages these for you and orchestrates them.

networks.title: Networks
networks.subtitle: French expertise
networks.description: Physically: Pixecurity holds the highest network certifications (Cisco), ensuring end-to-end security and compliance with cybersecurity standards. In the cloud: Pixecurity is committed to securing client data via sovereign cloud (OVH).

informationSystems.title: Information Systems
informationSystems.subtitle: The environment is you
informationSystems.description: The management of your information system, whether on server or client mode, is set up and configured according to your requirements (active directory, hardware choices).

storage.title: Storage
storage.subtitle: To infinity and beyond
storage.description: Whether in capacity or storage type (DAS, NAS, SAN), RAID security (1, 5, 10), hot or cold redundancy (mirror, cluster), Pixecurity certifies its expertise in this area.

partnersHeroSubtitle: Discover our trusted partners, global leaders in security and surveillance.
partnersHeroDescription1: At Pixecurity, we are committed to providing you with the best available solutions through collaborations with innovative and reputable companies. Each partner brings its expertise and cutting-edge technologies, covering a wide range of needs: IP surveillance, video management, access control, and more. Our partners offer advanced solutions to protect your assets and ensure your peace of mind.
partnersHeroDescription2: Browse our gallery to learn more about these companies and their products. We are proud to work with these major players to offer you the highest quality security solutions.
partnersHeroDescription3: Welcome to Pixecurity, where your security is our priority.

section1.text: Engineers above all. Even 3.0 engineers. Digital natives, involved in construction, networks, building technologies, technological watch... In short, real security solution dealers ready to find the right products tailored to your needs.

cards.text1: With civil engineering-trained engineers, Pixecurity retains a construction DNA, which remains the essence of our profession.
cards.text2: In addition to civil engineering, our senior engineers are trained in applied electronics: home automation, video protection, access control...
cards.text3: Pixecurity complements its team with certified network, systems, and IT engineers...

section3.quote:
"Our goal?
Meet the requirements and anticipate the needs of our clients.
Simplify the understanding of security."
section3.author: -- Yann Duchet, CEO Pixecurity

section4.title: Meet the Pixecurity Experts
section4.subtitle: Qualified specialists who bring their expertise to provide optimal protection.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Let's Get In Touch
contact.description: Tell us who you are and describe your issue in a few words. We will contact you as soon as possible to start the project.
contact.name: Last Name
contact.companyError: Company name must not exceed 30 characters
contact.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
contact.validationError: Please fill out all fields correctly

partnersActus.title: News from Our Partners
partnersActus.description: Discover the latest news and important announcements from our trusted partners. Their innovations and advanced solutions strengthen our mission: to provide you with top-notch security. Stay updated with the leaders in the industry.
